1.title: Rust
1.plot: Following an apocalyptic infection, a father must race against the clock to bring his infected son, Damien, back to humanity by feeding him memories of his past. While his attempts seem to show signs of progress, he also becomes infected, narrowing the gap to complete the cognitive recharge for Damien.

2.title: Replica
2.plot: In a not so distant future, breakthrough technology will allow for the cloning of human beings for those that can afford them. After 13-year-old Corinne becomes terminally ill, her wealthy aunt decides to bring the girls clone into the home for harvesting. When Corinne discovers her clone alone in the basement, they forge an unlikely bond that will ultimately force Corinne to make a life-altering decision.

3.title: Out of Sight/Out of Mind
3.plot: Enter Gabe Lancaster, a young man with a troubled past steeped in run-ins with the law. After his brother Eric posts his bail and helps arrange a second chance under house arrest, Gabe finds himself the new tenant of Eric's dilapidated house. The house takes hold of Gabe's interest immediately, and he wastes no time in making himself comfortable while his brother is away for military training. What starts as a simple time of self-reflection soon turns into a angst-filled, hallucinatory nightmare as Eric uncovers signs that he may not be in fact the only foreign tenant...

4.title: Skookum
4.plot: Neal DeGeorge Jr. comes to grips with his understanding of reality after a group of backwoods squatters involves him in their territorial struggle against Sasquatch in Appalachia. While there, Neil forms a complex relationship with Ruby, the sheltered daughter of the squatter chief with her own primal agenda.

imdb.plot outline: Immersing and culturing itself on an ever-developing planet, it looked to the future as an "era of no loss" Day by Day, the empty spots on the map were filled. Little by little, complacency become key. One by one, uncertainties were put to rest. But there are SOME aspects of our "civilized" world that still creep in and continue to haunt us. We embrace them. We continue to ask questions. For they are timeless. They are life-changing. They are CEREBRAL.
imdb.title: Cerebral
plot: Immersing and culturing itself on an ever-developing planet, it looked to the future as an "era of no loss" Day by Day, the empty spots on the map were filled. Little by little, complacency become key. One by one, uncertainties were put to rest. But there are SOME aspects of our "civilized" world that still creep in and continue to haunt us. We embrace them. We continue to ask questions. For they are timeless. They are life-changing. They are CEREBRAL.::Versa Studios Media
